ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD breaks up the Family Guy home, and previews some of the other lowlights from this fall TV season! MAD also shouts down Adam Sandler, freaks out on Tom Cruise and probes a chilling alternate universe with no such things as video games!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:07:38. [Issue ID 129292]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/mad-458-we-salute-family-guy/4000-129292/
